PersonalStatement.text: David Butler, born on 1983-08-20, is a Male based in Anthonyland, Haiti. He is Single and holds Finnish nationality. Currently working at Martin-Bond.

WorkExperience.text: Systems Administrator at Freeman, Hernandez and Valdez from 2006 to 2019.
Senior Financial Analyst at Martin-Bond, 2017 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Marketing from Izmir Institute of Technology (IZTECH)
Master's in Engineering from Universidad Nacional de Colombia

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys photography.
